Title: Relates to establishing a first permanent payroll employee tax credit
Summary: Establishes a first permanent payroll employee tax credit which allows a business to receive a tax credit for the three years following the employment of such business' first permanent payroll employee where such credit equals a portion of the amount it costs to employ such permanent payroll employee.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a first permanent payroll employee tax credit
